formats.name: AMA
formats.example: Lastname AA, Lastname BB, Lastname CC. Title of the article. Name of the Journal. Year;volume(number):pages. doi:xx.xxxx/xxxxx

formats.name: ISO 690
formats.example: LASTNAME, Firstname, LASTNAME, Firstname and LASTNAME, Firstname, year. Title of the article. Name of the Journal. Vol. X, no. X, pp. XX-XX. https://doi.org/xx.xxxx/xxxxx

formats.name: Vancouver
formats.description: Used in medicine and health sciences
formats.example: Author AA, Author BB, Author CC. Title of the article. Name of the journal. Year;volume(number):pages. doi: xx.xxxx/xxxxx

formats.name: APA
formats.description: Widely used format in social sciences
formats.example: Author, A. A., Author, B. B., & Author, C. C. (Year). Title of the article. Name of the Journal, volume(number), pages. https://doi.org/xx.xxxx/xxxxx

formats.name: MLA
formats.description: Commonly used in humanities, literature and linguistics
formats.example: Lastname, Firstname. "Title of the Article." Name of the Journal, vol. X, no. X, Year, pp. XX-XX. DOI or URL.

formats.name: Harvard
formats.example: Lastname, Initial. (Year) 'Title of the article', Name of the Journal, volume(number), pages. doi: xx.xxxx/xxxxx

formats.name: ABNT
formats.example: LASTNAME, Firstname; LASTNAME, Firstname. Title of the article. Name of the journal, City, v. X, n. X, p. XX-XX, month. year.

formats.name: Chicago
formats.description: Used in history and some social sciences
formats.example: Lastname, Firstname. Year. "Title of the Article." Name of the Journal volume(number): pages. https://doi.org/xx.xxxx/xxxxx
